name: Boat Builder: Andy's Story
description:
In this game you have to play as Andy, an experienced yachtsman who starts his new way of life working at his own shipyard. Buy materials, build boats and yachts, complete orders. Start with something simple and build your skills from fishing boats to racing yachts.

  • Buy boat building materials
  • Improve your knowledge in shipbuilding
  • Fulfill your customers' orders
  • Trade on the islands
  • Meet the inhabitants of neighboring islands and carry out their orders
  • Find the hidden treasures of the pirates
  • Sail to distant islands
  • Don't forget to enjoy the sea and nature around. Relax.
  • Follow the storyline that will help you learn Andy's story.
